ingredients: 115g ground almonds (store bought and sifted before you weigh or home ground in a spice grinder and sifted before you weigh)
144g egg whites (separated, covered in plastic wrap and left at room temperature for a few hours)
125 mls (1/2 cup) freshly squeezed lemon juice
85g (6 tablespoons/ ¾ stick) unsalted butter, very cold, cut into small cubes
